name: Sonic the Hedgehog Spinball
overview: Sonic The Hedgehog spins into pinball pandemonium! Dr. Robotnik's latest robotic-creation factory is the Veg-O-Fortress, a volcanic island fueled by the Chaos Emeralds and protected by the Pinball Defense System. Strap on your Power Sneakers for all-new Sonic moves! Sonic rockets into space, spring launches from levers and balls up for a high-altitude bounce! Multi-round zones of wild Sonic action through glittering caverns, oozing toxic pools and boiling lava pits!
